entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipawin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nipawin Airport 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

Temperature: -31.2°C
Pressure: 103.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
